name: ScreeningMammographyAndDBTStudies
title: Screening Mammography and DBT Studies
description: This value set is associated with the "Breast Cancer Screening Recall Rates" measure used in the Centers for Medicare & Medicaid Services (CMS) Hospital Outpatient Quality Reporting (OQR) Program. It is also referred to as "OP-39."
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values contains CPT and HCPCS codes associated with screening studies used to identify breast cancer in men and women.),(Data Element Scope: The intent of this data element is to identify patients who underwent a screening mammography or screening digital breast tomosynthesis (DBT).),(Inclusion Criteria: CPT and HCPCS codes that identify breast screening imaging studies performed using traditional mammography or DBT are captured in this value set.),(Exclusion Criteria: Codes not associated with breast screening are excluded from this value set. Similarly, codes from alternative terminologies other than CPT and HCPCS are excluded from this value set.)

contains.display: Screening digital breast tomosynthesis, bilateral (List separately in addition to code for primary procedure)
Screening mammography, bilateral (2-view study of each breast), including computer-aided detection (CAD) when performed
Screening, diagnostic, film, digital or digital breast tomosynthesis (3d) mammography results documented and reviewed
Screening, diagnostic, film, digital or digital breast tomosynthesis (3d) mammography results were not documented and reviewed, reason not otherwise specified
